metadata.Title: ALSA-2021:1846: idm:DL1 and idm:client security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.Description:
AlmaLinux Identity Management (IdM) is a centralized authentication, identity management, and authorization solution for both traditional and cloud-based enterprise environments. 
Security Fix(es):
* jquery: Passing HTML containing <option> elements to manipulation methods could result in untrusted code execution (CVE-2020-11023)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the AlmaLinux Release Notes linked from the References section.
